snippet: The index ranks pharmaceutical companies based on how readily they get medicines to the world’s poor, how much research they do on tropical diseases and how ethically they conduct clinical trials.
abstract: GlaxoSmithKline holds on to top spot in Access to Medicines Index, which ranks world's top 20 pharmaceutical companies in terms of how readily they get medicines to world's poor; index does, however, show other competitors closing in.
lead_paragraph: The index ranks pharmaceutical companies based on how readily they get medicines to the world’s poor, how much research they do on tropical diseases and how ethically they conduct clinical trials.

headline.seo: GlaxoSmithKline Tops Access to Medicines Index
headline.main: Pharmaceuticals: GlaxoSmithKline Retains Top Ranking Measuring Outreach to Poor Countries
headline.print_headline: Pharmaceuticals: GlaxoSmithKline Retains Top Ranking Measuring Outreach to Poor Countries
